example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 也)) (PP-PRP (P 因为) (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 看到) (NP-OBJ (NN 华人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 这麽)) (VP (VV 团结))) (DEV 地)) (VP (VV 站) (ADVP (AD 在一起))))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 触动) (NP-OBJ (NP (PN 她)) (LCP (NP (NN 心)) (LC 中)) (DNP (ADJP (JJ 深层)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 感动)))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (PP-TMP (P 自) (NP (PN 此))) (VP (VV 立下) (NP-OBJ (NP (NN 志向))))))
